record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: AKVATOR INNOVATIONAL ECOLOGICALLY CLEAN TECHNOLOGY IN VITICULTURE
Инновационная экологически чистая технология «Акватор» в виноградарстве
record.abstract: The article provides an overview of the results of the research of non-root treatment of bushes with activated water with the features of BAS. We have found that activated water, charged with the "Akvator" device through the BAS matrix has the property of impact on plant and the efficiency exceeds impact of BAS solutions themselves

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: INNOVATIONS OF RUSSIAN VITICULTURE. 29. HARVESTING OF GRAPES
Новации виноградарства России. 29. Уборка урожая винограда
record.abstract: The article highlights the questions of a preliminary determination of vineyard yield, studying the dynam-ics of sugar content in berries, harvesting methods of handheld and mechanized grape harvesters. We have also presented color photographs of functioning har-vesters in the vineyards

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: DIGITAL PROCESS CONTROL SYSTEM OF HEATED AIR FOR DRYING SEEDS USING A REGULATOR WITH DOUBLE DIFFERENTIATION
Цифровая система управления процессом подогрева воздуха для сушки семян с использованием регулятора двойного дифференцирования
record.abstract: In the article we present questions of digital process control of heated air for drying seeds; it is shown that the change in the load of the heat source slightly changes the dynamics of the system for stabilizing the temperature of hot air, making it almost invariant with respect to perturbations. It is proved that the use of digital controller with dual differentiation significantly improves the performance of the automatic control system, excluding the increase astatism of the management system

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: POLYGON AGROECOLOGICAL MONITORING OF THE SOILS OF THE BELGOROD REGION
Полигонный агроэкологический мониторинг почв Белгородской области

affiliationsList.affiliationName: Institute of retraining and advanced training of agribusiness

record.abstract: The article presents the results of the studies to determine the changes of fertility parameters in typical black soils of the Belgorod region after three rotations in field crop while applying various technologies of cultivation of agricultural crops

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: RARE PROTECTED SPECIES OF BIRDS SUBARCTIC PART OF DIAMONDIFEROUS PROVINCE OF YAKUTIA
Редкие охраняемые виды птиц субарктической части алмазоносной провинции Якутии

affiliationsList.affiliationName: Institute of Biological Problems of Cryolithozone Siberian Division

record.abstract: The article presents the results of field observations and analysis of literature data on avifauna, the distribution and nature of the presence of protected species of birds in the areas of finding placer deposits of diamonds in the subarctic Western Yakutia

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: MATHEMATICAL MODEL OF A MACHINE AND TRACTOR UNIT WITH EDM IN TRANSMISSION OF A TRACTOR
Математическая модель машинно-тракторного агрегата с УДМ в трансмиссии трактора
record.abstract: The developed mathematical model of the machine and tractor unit with the elastically damping mechanism in transmission of a tractor is given in the article. The analysis of mathematical model of the arable unit on the basis of a tractor with EDM in transmission showed that the MTU mathematical model can be considered as working

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: ACCURATE FORECAST AS AN EFFECTIVE WAY TO REDUCE THE ECONOMIC RISK OF AGRO-INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX
Точный прогноз как эффективный способ снижения экономического риска агропромышленного комплекса
record.abstract: This article discusses the ways of reducing the financial, economic and social risks on the basis of an accurate prediction. We study the importance of natural time series of winter wheat yield, minimum winter, winter-spring daily temperatures. The feature of the time series of this class is disobeying a normal distribution, there is no visible trend

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: METHOD OF PROGNOSIS OF GRAPE CUTTINGS ROOTING
Метод прогнозирования укореняемости виноградных черенков
record.abstract: There were determined the close correlation dependence between the energy of propagation of wheat seeds sunk in water in which the grape cuttings were rooted on one side and the rooting and output of cuttings with three roots and more on other side by the authors. There were the equations of regression for prognosis of rooting and output of cuttings with three roots and more

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: TO THE PROBLEM OF COMPLEX GRAIN HARVESTING
К решению проблемы комплексной уборки зерновых культур
record.abstract: The ways and the methods of the solution of the problem of complex cleaning of grain crops were proved; the de-pendences of engine capacity of the Massey Ferguson tractors of 8200 series on the capacity of a thresher of the hook-on combine were received

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: TRANSFORMATION OF THE CATEGORY "INCOME" AND ITS MODERN CONTENT IN THE ACCOUNTING SYSTEM OF ALCOHOL INDUSTRY
Трансформация категории «доходы» и ее современное содержание в системе бухгалтерского учета организаций спиртовой отрасли

affiliationsList.affiliationName: Financial university at the government of the RF

record.abstract: The article analyzes the transformation of the category "Income", it is clarified the modern meaning of this concept, taking into account industry characteristics of organizations engaged in the production of alcohol and alcoholic beverages

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: EFTIHIYA – THE NEWEST WINE AROMATIC VARIETY WITH PINK COLORED BERRY
Эфтихия – новейший винный ароматный сорт винограда с розовой ягодой
record.abstract: The newest wine grape variety Eftihiya with aromatic pink colored skin (in Greek the name means “happi-ness”) was breed with hybridization at the Athens In-stitute of Viticulture by P. Zamanidi, L. Troshin and P. Radchevskiy in 2005 by crossing the Greek varieties and Malaguzya with Eurasian Traminer pink. Dura-tion of production period from bud burst to harvest 146-155 days. Yields are very high: 25-30 t / ha. Modal mass of clusters is 250 g. Bunch is conical, me-dium density. Berry is medium, short elliptical, pink colored, with a thick wax coating. Pulp and juice with the expressed varietal flavor, similar to the aroma of Traminer pink. Sugar content of more than 24%. Vari-ety is designed for production for the dry white wines of excellent class and high-quality sparkling, dessert and sweet wines; suitable for the production of high quality aromatic juices

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: THE PERSPECTIVES OF FIELD CROPS CARE WHEN SPRAYING
Перспективы ухода за полевыми сельхозкультурами при опрыскивании
record.abstract: The efficiency of an ultra-low-volume spraying (ULV) of field crops was substantiated; we have also presented high performance complex machines

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: ANALYSIS OF ALLELIC POLYMORPHISM OF SELF-INCOMPATIBILITY IN SOME RUSSIAN VARIETIES OF PEARS (PYRUS COMMUNIS L.) USING CONSENSUS AND S5 AND S8, ALLELE - SPECIFIC DNA MARKERS
Анализ аллельного полиморфизма гена самонесовместимости у некоторых отечественных сортов груши (Pyrus communis L.) c использованием консенсусных и S5 ,S8, аллель - специфичных ДНК маркеров

affiliationsList.affiliationName: State Scientific Organization North Caucasian Regional Research Institute of Horticulture and Viticulture of the Russian Academy of Agricultural Sciences

record.abstract: In the process of the research we had accomplished an analysis of allelic polymorphism of self-incompatibility in pears in demand in the production and breeding of modern varieties of pears of North-Caucasian Zonal Research Institute of Horticulture and Viticulture collection of genetic resources. In the first stage the consensus primers PycomC1F and PycomC5R were used. With obtained data, after identification of the alleles studied in varieties using consensus primers an allele specific S5 and S8 DNA markers were used for confirming the presence / absence of data allele studied cultivars

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: APPROBATION OF ISSR DNA-MARKERS FOR GENOTYPING OF RARE PLANTS SPECIES OF THE WESTERN CAUCASUS: LILIUM CAUCASICUM MISCZ. EX GROSSH., GALÁNTHUS WORONOWII KOLAK., PANCRATIUM MARITIMUM L.
Апробация ISSR ДНК-маркеров для генотипирования редких видов растений западного кавказа: Lilium Caucasicum Miscz. Ex Grossh., Galanthus woronowii Kolak., Pancratium maritimum L.

affiliationsList.affiliationName: SSI "Institute of Floriculture and Subtropical Crops"
All-Russian Scientific and Research Institute of Floriculture and Subtropical Crops

record.abstract: The study was aimed on approbation of 11 ISSR DNA-markers for their using in DNA fingerprinting of rare plant species of the Western Caucasus Lilium Caucasicum Miscz. Ex Grossh., Galánthus woronowii Kolak., Pancratium maritimum L. according to results DNA-markers set was selected for further using in the investigation of genetic diversity of the mentioned plant species

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: COMPARISON OF SOIL TEST METHODS FOR AVAILABLE PHOSPHORUS IN COMMON CALCAREOUS BLACK SOIL
Сравнительная характеристика методов определения содержания подвижного фосфора в черноземе обыкновенном карбонатном
record.abstract: The article presents a comparative analysis of the results on available phosphorus measurements in common black soils using the Machigin and Olsen methods. The relationships between maize productivity and soil available phosphorus and also between phosphorus concentrations in the above-ground plant parts and soil available phosphorus were identified at various stages of crop development

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: THE CONTENT OF MACRO- AND MICRONUTRIENTS IN CORN GRAIN GROWN ON ORDINARY BLACK SOILS UNDER FERTILIZATION
Содержание макро- и микроэлементов в зерне кукурузы при внесении удобрений на черноземе обыкновенном
record.abstract: The article describes the results of studies on elemental composition of corn grain under various fertilizer treatments. The balanced application of fertilizers is an important factor in optimizing corn nutrition on ordinary black soils and obtaining ecologically safe and clean crop production

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: ECONOMIC EFFICIENCY OF A MOLDBOARD TILLAGE USING THE DEVELOPED COMBINED REVERSIBLE PLOUGHS
Экономическая эффективность отвальной обработки почвы разработанным комбинированным лемешным плугом
record.abstract: The article deals with the question of economic efficiency of moldboard tillage using the developed combined ploughshare plow as a result of experimental studies, determining the degree of traction resistance of the reversible plow tillage combined with reversible plow. We have also found main economic indicators of the manufacturing operation and calculation of efficiency of investments for the implementation of the combined plow

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: THE RESULTS OF EXPERIMENTAL STUDIES TO DETERMINE THE DEGREE OF TRACTION RESISTANCE REVERSIBLE PLOW IN HEAVY SOILS
Результаты экспериментальных исследований определение степени тягового сопротивления лемешного плуга при обработке тяжелых почв
record.abstract: The article deals with the question of experimental studies determining the degree of traction resistance of reversible ploughs, when processing a combined plow. We have determined the optimal geometric dimensions of the developed additional working bodies experimentally

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: THE COMPOSITION AND PROPERTIES OF FLAX OIL AS A COSMETIC INGREDIENT
Состав и свойства льняного масла как ингредиента косметических средств
record.abstract: This article studies fatty acid composition of flax oil of the new sort called “Surprise”. We defined the main characteristics of cosmetic oils. We propose to use the mix of flax oils in the formulation of cosmetics

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: RESEARCH OF THE INFLUENCE OF THE PARAMETERS OF ELECTRIC OZONIZATION ON THE SURVIVAL OF MICROORGANISMS
Исследования влияния параметров электроозонирования на выживаемость тест-микроорганизмов
record.abstract: The article presents: the results of experimental studies of the influence of parameters on Escherichia coli ozonation and Staphylococcus aureus, the optimal parameters of ozonation hive on the criterion of minimum energy intensity of the treatment

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: RESEARCH OF QUALITY CONTROL OF OZONE CONCENTRATIONS IN A BEEHIVE USING A STABILIZING SYSTEM OF OZONIZATION OF COLONIES
Исследование качества регулирования концентрации озона в улье с использованием системы стабилизированного электроозонирования пчелиных семей
record.abstract: The article presents a designed circuit diagram of electro-ozonization device and the algorithm of its work, a s well as the results of experimental studies of the system of stabilized ozonation of bee colonies in the wild apiaries of the Krasnodar region and the assessment of quality control

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: INNOVATIVE ACTIVITY OF BUSINESS STRUCTURES IN THE AGRICULTURAL SEC-TOR OF ECONOMICS
Инновационная активность предпринимательских структур в аграрном секторе экономики
record.abstract: The article examines the indicators of innovation activity of business structures, on the example of the Stavropol region, to determine the most effective areas of the state-term support of the agro-industrial complex of Russia

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: Анализ процесса резания длинностебельных кормов сегментом с криволинейной режущей кромкой
Анализ процесса резания длинностебельных кормов сегментом с криволинейной режущей кромкой
record.abstract: We have proposed a cutting segment for commercially available feeders; we have also presented the design scheme of the cutting edges and the angle of segment installation on a working body

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: USE OF PLANTS TINCTURES FOR YOUNG ANIMALS TREATMENT
Применение спиртовых настоек лекарственных растений при болезнях молодняка животных
record.abstract: The article presented experimental data of alcoholic mixtures of medicinal plants in combination with antimicrobial agents in dyspepsia of calves. Use tinctures with antibiotics improved the general condition of the animals and prevented their death

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: STUDYING THE EFFECT OF PRESSURE IN THE PROCESSES OF HEAT MASS TRANSFER AT SOLID PHASE DURING DRYING
Исследование эффекта давления в процессах тепломассопереноса с твердой фазой при сушке
record.abstract: The article studies the issues of mathematical description of pressure effect in the processes of heat mass transfer with a solid phase during drying

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: MODELLING THE KINETICS OF DRYING, DEFORMATION AND MINIMIZATION OF RICE CRACK FORMATION
Моделирование кинетики сушки, деформации и минимизация трещинноватости риса
record.abstract: The article studies the issues of drying, deformation and minimization of rice crack formation according to different parameters of drying modes

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: INDUSTRIAL AND TECHNOLOGICAL IN-FRASTRUCTURE OF THE AGRIFOOD MARKET OF THE REPUBLIC OF ADYGEA
Производственно–технологическая инфраструктура агропродовольственного рынка Республики Адыгея
record.abstract: The article defines the role and the place of produc-tion and technological infrastructure in the agrifood market development factors; the economic analysis of the current state of production and technological infrastructure of the agrifood market in the Republic of Adygea

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: REPRODUCTIVE QUALITIES OF LANDRACE PIGS OF DIFFERENT GENOTYPES IN GENES PRLR AND MC4R
Воспроизводительные качества свиней породы ландрас разных генотипов по генам PRLR и МС4R
record.abstract: The article presents an analysis of the influence of genes PRLR and MC4R on reproductive performance of Landrace sows. The frequency of alleles and genotypes of this marker genes and their relationship to reproductive performance are shown

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: INTENSIFICATION OF THE TECHNOLOGY FOR SMOKED SAUSAGES
Интенсификация технологии сырокопченых колбас
record.abstract: In the article we have presented the results of the approbation of the technology of intensification of smoked sausages with application of electromagnetic processing with low frequencies of starting cultures and meat raw materials

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: SUBSTANTIATION OF PRODUCTION AND PORK QUALITY STANDARD, INTRAVITAL ENRICHED WITH NUTRIENTS FOR USE IN THE TECHNOLOGY OF FOOD PRODUCTS OF THE FUNCTIONAL ORIENTATION
Обоснование получения и качественная оценка свинины, прижизненно обогащенной нутриентами для использования в технологии продуктов питания функциональной направленности
record.abstract: In this article we have presented material results of the complex researches of the kinds of feeding animals for baby food manufacturing. The requirements to feeding and cultivation of pigs for manufacture of products of the functional purpose have been formulated

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: THEORETICAL AND METHODOLOGICAL ASPECTS OF COMPETITION ESTIMATION IN AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION
Теоретико-методологические аспекты оценки конкуренции в аграрном производстве
record.abstract: This article presents an investigation of the theoretical and methodological aspects of competition’s estimation in agricultural production, the essence, the nature, types of competition, circumstances of competition in agricultural production and factors of competitiveness of production of meat and meat products. There is the rating of competitiveness of production of cattle’s and poultry’s meat in regions of the Southern Federal District in accordance with a new methodological approach to assessing the competitiveness of production of meat and meat products

keywords.keyword: PRODUCERS OF MEAT AND MEAT PRODUCTS

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: CIVIL STATUS OF THE RUSSIAN FARMS
Гражданско-правовой статус крестьянских (фермерских) хозяйств
record.abstract: The analysis of legal statuses and prospects of existence of farms created in Russia in the last 15 years is presented in article

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: DIFFERENTIAL TREATMENT OF INCUBATING EGGS OF MEAT CHICKEN BREEDS
Дифференцированный режим инкубации яиц кур мясных пород
record.abstract: Differentiation of temperature influence on embryos at incubation of eggs shows positive results: the output of chickens is synchronized, duration of embryogenesis is reduced, deductibility of eggs raises, the young growth output increases

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: SYNCHRONIZE HATCHING
Синхронизация вывода цыплят
record.abstract: Differentiation of temperature influence on embryos at incubation of eggs shows positive results: the output of chickens is synchronized, duration of embryogenesis is reduced, deductibility of eggs raises, the young growth output increases

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: MANUFACTURING ORGANIC PORK FOR PRODUCTS OF KID'S FOOD AND FUNCTIONAL FOOD WITH APPLICATION OF PROBIOTICS
Производство органической свинины для продуктов детского и функционального питания с применением пробиотиков
record.abstract: We have studied the influence of dietary probiotics and metal salts, iron and copper, as detoxifiers for the negative factors which adversely affect the sanitary condition of feeds for farm animals. The optimal doses of detoxifiers in the food infected with mold due to storage conditions were found. The positive effect was, on average, 8%

keywords.keyword: SAFETY AND QUALITY OF RAW ORGANIC MEAT

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: INTERMEDIATE CROPS AS A FACTOR OF BIO RICE PRODUCTION
Промежуточные посевы – фактор биологизированного рисоводства
record.abstract: The article shows the results of years of research, which showed that the intermediate culture - is an important factor in the impact of increasing the fertility of meadow black soils, meadow (rice) soils perform environmental, agronomical and soil protection roles, as well as they are involved in the biological cycle of nutrients

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: USING YOUNG GROWTH OF THE HORNED CATTLE FOR PRODUCING ORGANIC BEEF FOR BABY FOOD
Молодняк крупного рогатого скота для получения органической говядины для детского питания
record.abstract: Experimental data were obtained to draft a national standard for organic production of meat from calves of meat breeds to produce baby food in the new conditions of development of the meat industry. Research results have shown that Aberdeen-Angus meat breed cattle meets the national standard of RUSSIA 52478-2005 for raw meat for baby food due to chemical composition of meat and its quality

keywords.keyword: SAFETY AND QUALITY OF RAW MEAT

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: IMPROVEMENT OF STEPPE RED CATTLE WITH A CAPACITY OF AYRSHIRE AND HOLSTEIN BREEDS
Совершенствование красного степного скота с использованием потенциала айрширской и голштинской пород
record.abstract: The article presents the results of the studies of the effect on heifers of Red Steppe breed and hybrids, inclueding their growth, form of the udder, milk production. The cows breed was improved by Ayrshire bulls and red -and-white Holsteins in the South zone of the Rostov region

record.journalTitle: Polythematic Online Scientific Journal of Kuban State Agrarian University
record.title: PROVIDES AN ASSESSMENT OF THE IMPACT OF THE DEVELOPED BREATHER GEAR ON RESOURCE TRACTOR TRANSMISSION, METHODS OF DETERMINATION OF WEAR AND TEAR
Оценка влияния разработанного сапуна редуктора на ресурс трансмиссии трактора, методы определения износа деталей
record.abstract: The paper presents an assessment of the impact of the developed breather gear the resource tractor transmission and analyzes methods for the determination of wear and tear by spectral analysis of the oil, and the essence of the method of measuring the intensity of X-ray fluorescence emission of iron accumulated in the oil
